name: Pareen Lathia

people_also_viewed.name: Prathamesh Pathak
people_also_viewed.about: AVP- Marketing at Baroda BNP Paribas Mutual Fund

people_also_viewed.name: Priyanka Sharma
people_also_viewed.about: Director, Communications @ Shardeum, an EVM-based autoscaling blockchain | Ex-Head of PR & Comms @ WazirX

recommendations: Aniket Mohite “Pareen is a realist, practical & very competitive person rather than just being the CEO of REDCOM. Working with him has helped me learn a lot & have been very happy about his practicality about a work (project / technology) approach. He is highly skilled & motivated individual whose ideas are well scaled up & implemented by him. His work with Alumni Portal is really appreciative. I wish him all the best for his future endeavors.”
publications: [{"title":"Can India really ban bitcoin? Is it possible at all to do so?","subtitle":"The Economic Times","date":"May 16, 2018","description":"Publications about RBI's ban on Bitcoin are nothing but misleading. It is important to know exactly what the RBI did and what are the practical implications. This article covers just that."}]
projects: [{"title":"Content Management System","start_date":"Feb 2012","end_date":"Present","description":"This Content Management Systems is developed for one of the leading IT training institute having more than 350 center around the globe.The primary objective of this systems is to deliver course material in e-book format, collaborating students across centers with faculties and students from other centers, Online JOB interview Tips, Providing Resources useful in developing their project, Displaying projects, On Line Resource Library etcs.The entire project is getting developed in open source environment using DRUPAL, PHP , MYSQL and other open source tools."},{},{},{"title":"E-Learning Project","start_date":"Feb 2012","end_date":"Present","description":"This E-Learning Content Management Systems is developed for one of the leading IT training institute having more than 350 centers around the globe with more than 10000 students.The primary objective of this systems is to deliver course material in e-book format, collaborating students across centers with faculties and students from other centers, Online JOB interview Tips, Providing Resources useful in developing their project, Displaying projects, On Line Resource Library etcs.The entire project is getting developed in open source environment using DRUPAL, PHP , MYSQL and other open source tools."},{},{}]
